programmes.show_description: Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.
Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.
15/21. Isabelle's position as top flyer is challenged. Tha inbhe Iseabail, mar shàr-itealaiche, ga dhùbhlanachadh fhad 's a tha na caraidean a' lorg stuth-leapa/stràibhig.
16/21. Phoenix has picked up a strange smell. Tha Phoenix air fàile neònach fhaighinn. Tha na buthaidean a' feuchainn ri thuigsinn cò às a thàinig e.
1/40. Feumar Fuigheag a shocrachadh an-diugh nuair a tha rud steigeach a' steigeadh ris. Fuigheag must be calmed when a sticky thing gets attached to him.
11/15. Eilidh Cormack meets Callum and his pet dogs Penny and Poppy.
31/52. Tha iad a' campadh a-muigh a-nochd ach chan eil e cho furasta dhaibh tuiteam nan cadal. They're camping outside tonight but it isn't so easy for them to fall asleep.
5/52. Tha 'ad uile a' sàbhaladh bhoiteagan an-diugh. They're all saving worms today.
6/52. Tha Pip 'son 's gum bi e fhèin is Posy nan càraid phollag ach tha trioblaid aig Posy. Pip wants himself and Posy to be puddle twins, but Posy has a problem.
71/82. Rosemary Ward reads Uaireannan, written and illustrated by Rebecca Elliot and translated into Gaelic by Donald John Macleod.
...Ath-dhoras/The Royals Next Door. 37/52. Tha Stella ri strì 'son faighinn a-mach a bheil bràmair aig Mgr Bruno. Stella is determined to find out if Mr Bruno has a girlfriend.
...Ath-dhoras/The Royals Next Door. 38/52. Tha Stella sìceach an-diugh. Stella is psychic today.
...Gumbalan/Bottersnikes and Gumbles. 38/52. Tha Uilidh ag ionnsachadh mun Ghumbal gun Ainm an-diugh. Uilidh learns about the Un-named Gumbal today.
7/13. Tha seann teampall falaichte le ìomhaighean annasach, na dhìomhaireas do Na Neachdan. A strange hidden ancient temple with unusual statues is a mystery to the Neachdan today.
1/5. Iagan MacNeil explores the Fife Coastal Path, from the Kincardine Bridge to Limekilns.
7/13. Calum Maclean is in Glasgow taking a step back in time along the banks of the River Clyde. We also meet learners Audrey and Davy Paterson from Taynuilt.
Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach là cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.
4/5. Se àm buain a th'ann, agus tha Màiri a' tadhal air gàrradairean ann a Leòdhas agus ann a Lodainn an Ear. Mairi visits flower growers, a beekeeper and a polytunnel gardener.
15/16. Alasdair MacLeod on the challenges facing the Icelandic language. Icelanders point to rising immigration, the increasing prevalence of English and the influence of technology.

programmes.show_name: Trusadh - Beatha air an Oir/Lost Villages
programmes.show_description: 12/14. Bailtean a chaidh fhalamhachadh ann an Ùig, na Hearadh agus na Lochan. Deserted villages in Uig, Harris and Lochs.
1/4. Coinneach MacLeod explores the food traditions of the Faroes. Tha Coinneach MacLeòid a' faighinn blasad de chultar a' bhidhe sna h-Eileanan Fàrach.
9/33. An seinneadair-sgrìobhadair Albannach, Ben Walker le seisean acoustic aig Belladrum 2025. Scottish singer-songwriter Ben Walker performs an acoustic session.
1/6. Coinneach MacFhraing makes the journey over to the remote island of Mingulay, home to some of the most spectacular sea cliffs in Europe.

...Adventures of Abney & Teal. 28/52. It is a hot and sunny day on the Island, so Abney and Teal make themselves shady, straw hats.
12/26. Tha Seillean a' sealltainn dhuinn mar a tha i a dèanamh mil. Seillean shows us how she makes honey.
7/8. Celestine and her mouse friends are looking for a place to build a tree house in the forest.
72/82. Derek MacIntosh reads Maighstir Mòr, written and illustrated by Ed Vere and translated into Gaelic by Donald John MacLeod.
...Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud. 41/52. The Spuds visit Betty's sister, Aunty Barbara, on her farm. Dave goes on an egg-citing adventure involving magic beans!
6/13. Tha Hilda a' feuchainn ri trioblaidean a chur ceart le geasan. Hilda tries to fix problems with spells and charms.
2/2. Ellen NicDhòmhnaill le taghadh de na còig criomagan fiosrachaidh a b' fheàrr a chòrd rithe fhèin. Ellen MacDonald introduces a selection of her favourite facts.
2/6. Tha bhìoras coimpiutaireach mu sgaoil ann an Sgoil Taobh na Cloiche. A computer virus is spreading through Sgoil Taobh na Cloiche.

programmes.show_description: Live football action from the Scottish Challenge Cup in the first semi-final with Ayr United welcoming Inverness. CT.
2/12. Niall Iain Macdonald hosts a quiz show where two teams go head-to-head to win a cash prize. Niall Iain Dòmhnallach le farpais cheist ùr is dà sgioba a' strì airson duais airgid.
